title: JAM ORB / dlc truck
description: Those are some big letters on that truck.

dialogueTree.title: Shivers: "The Delta Logistics Company truck s..."
dialogueTree.text: The Delta Logistics Company truck stands here waiting, reflecting white light from the courtyard behind it.

links.title: Shivers: "You knew it would be here, blocking..."
links.text: You knew it would be here, blocking the gate.

links.title: You: "Are there people in there?"
links.text: Are there people in there?

links.title: Shivers: "Yes, people hard at work at their d..."
links.text: Yes, people hard at work at their desks. They can barely tell if it's day or night anymore because the lights in the building are so uniform and bright. Who knows when they'll come out?

links.title: You: "What keeps them motivated?"
links.text: What keeps them motivated?

links.title: Shivers: "Irony. They're yuppies masquerading..."
links.text: Irony. They're yuppies masquerading as Mazovians... Or was it Mazovians masquerading as yuppies? Even they get confused sometimes, out here in poverty-stricken Martinaise.

links.title: You: "Those don't sound like proper worki..."
links.text: Those don't sound like proper working conditions.

links.title: Shivers: "Yes, and it's rather ironic, becaus..."
links.text: Yes, and it's rather ironic, because they believe themselves to be Mazovians deep down.

links.title: You: "I hope they're working for the glor..."
links.text: I hope they're working for the glory of Revachol, at least.

links.title: Shivers: "Could be. Not sure they remember wh..."
links.text: Could be. Not sure they remember what they're working for anymore themselves...

links.title: You: "Sounds like a highly motivated bunc..."
links.text: Sounds like a highly motivated bunch.

links.title: Shivers: "Yes, they are highly motivated by i..."
links.text: Yes, they are highly motivated by irony, being yuppies masquerading as Mazovians... Or was it Mazovians masquerading as yuppies? Even they get confused sometimes, here in poverty-stricken Martinaise.

links.title: You: "Are they really so pressed for time..."
links.text: Are they really so pressed for time to finish whatever they're doing? Sounds potentially dangerous...

links.title: Shivers: "Could be. They certainly want to st..."
links.text: Could be. They certainly want to stir the pot. Remake reality in some new image.

links.title: You: "Why is the light so strange?"
links.text: Why is the light so strange?

links.title: Shivers: "Because this is a place of mystery."
links.text: Because this is a place of mystery.

links.title: You: "Can't I get into the courtyard some..."
links.text: Can't I get into the courtyard somehow?

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Whatever's going on there could ha..."
links.text: "Whatever's going on there could hardly be of any consequence to our ongoing investigation." The lieutenant adjusts his glasses.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You can come back to it on your ow..."
links.text: "You can come back to it on your own when we're done with this case."

links.title: Shivers: "Not yet."
links.text: Not yet.

links.title: You: "Let it go for now. [Leave.]"
links.text: Let it go for now. [Leave.]
